title: Team White Board

widgets.title: Team White Board
widgets.descriptionFull: Shared canvas for multiple users to observe and contribute to a white board drawing. May be overlaid on live network diagram or image assets.
widgets.descriptionShort: Shared canvas for multiple users to observe and contribute to a white board drawing. May be overlaid on live network diagram or image assets.
